alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ottawa, northeastern Wood and northeastern Lucas Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oregon, or 8 miles east of Toledo, moving southeast at 15 mph. Another strong storm about 3 miles north of Luckey, moving north at 15 mph will merge with the Oregon storm. Very heavy rain is likely with these storms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Oregon, Rossford, Northwood, Genoa, Walbridge, Millbury, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Harbor View, Williston, Bono and Stony Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
